The '2000â01 FA Cup' was the 120th season of the world's oldest knockout
football competition, the Football Association Cup or FA Cup. The competition
was won by Liverpool, who came from 1-0 behind against Arsenal to eventually win
2-1. The final was played outside of England for the first time, at the
Millennium Stadium in Cardiff, because Wembley Stadium was being knocked down to
be replaced with a new stadium.
